DOC.brief_summary: Since 1999 , labor pain control perform China , initial time analgesia cervix > = 2 cm . Meanwhile , American Society Obstetrics & Gynecology recommend labor analgesia neuraxial block perform cervix > = 4 cm 2002 . After , threshold revise least > = 2 cm 2006 Society . However , China , practice labor analgesia neuraxial block perform seven year . Up , practice experience ten-year period cervix around 1 cm . The investigator hypothesize labor pain control different stage different characteristic different influence patient short- long-lasting outcome . This study mainly investigate different labor analgesia procedure different stage since initiation practice 1999 , assess influence outcome display trajectory development labor analgesia China might fit whole process study labor analgesia throughout world . All do analyze data record since January 1999 December 2008 .
DOC.brief_title: Ten-year Practice Labor Pain Control China
